column3: NACK use of commas is very subjective (particularly before ["and"](https://www.grammarly.com/blog/comma-before-and/) on lists) and IMHO these additions don't improve readability.\n\n@RajaMBZ effort appreciated though and not meant to discourage. Just adding my 2c.
Well, thank you all for providing your valuable feedback & suggestion(s) in this regard. I'm now closing this PR.
Reverted back that particular change in the 2nd commit.
